chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 has the above problem: Good day, The display has scratches after we removed the protective film. Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We have carried out a commercial gesture of 60 € on your behalf to the customer. Indeed, according to our quality charter, the customer is entitled to this type of compensation because of Scratches on the display.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best Regards,
Ermelinda of Back Market
